name: markhoma
description: Independent developer. Founder of placecard.us. Creating digital tools to simplify event planning. Passionate about solving real-world problems through technology.

currentProject.name: Place Card Maker
currentProject.description: A fast, easy and free printable place card maker,Design beautiful place cards in minutes with our free, user-friendly maker. Choose from 100+ customizable place cards templates, including options for meal choices. Perfect for weddings, holidays, and special events. Compatible with Microsoft Word for easy editing and printing.
